subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: There is a sense that Kevin McHale, the reluctant coach of the reeling Timberwolves, is much more open to coaching than his curmudgeonly demeanor would suggest.
snippet: There is a sense that Kevin McHale, the reluctant coach of the reeling Timberwolves, is much more open to coaching than his curmudgeonly demeanor would suggest.
